title: Spawn - Burning Mighty Empires mp3 (2014)
description:
Biography:

Out of the Ashes of the Berlin Underground Band Mortal Viruz,
Spawn was formed by Matt, Oliver and No. in 1998
A year later the demo- CD "Headhunter" was released.
Early 2000, Hardy (Ex-Nuclear Tribunal) joined the band as
guitar player and Chrille (bass) left Spawn in August 2001.
He was replaced by Fux and the Promo- CD Veritas was
released. Alf joined Spawn from 2001 - 2003

The recording of the debut album "Systems Full Of Victims",
which was released by Bruchstein records, began immediately
and the next step towards Spawns concrete idea of Death Metal
was taken.
The album was presented live at the "Fuck The Commerce IV"
Open Air Neiden / Germany, where Spawn gained lots
of attention for their musical direction: Deep growls, a wall of
guitars and an incredible battery were kind of an astonishing
Death Metal assault.


This lead directly to the Blasphemy And Violence Tour with
Krisiun and Damnation 2001, where Spawn improved
their Show and took it to the next level.

Split-Ep "Hybrid Manifestation" with Harmony Dies 02/2002
April 2002: Spawn toured again for four weeks in Europe,
celebrating The Art Of Sickness together with Cryptopsy,
Haemorrhage and Profanity; another big success for Spawn.

Janice joined the band for bass from 2004-2009

Spawn recorded their devestating output Human Toxin
which was released in dec. 2004. Human Toxin is another
intense Death Metal statement of Spawn without any compromises
and you should expect nothing but a massive slap in your face
again! Lots of good reviews declared that SPAWN did it well.
After some deep grinding club gigs, Spawn entered the stage
of With Full Force Festival in summer 05. After supporting
Arch Enemy/Trivium in Berlin the band rejected itself writing
the final chapters for next output. After a refreshing break and
split up with Hardy the band raised the new line up completed
with Dirk on the second guitar.

In 2008 SPAWN entered again the DailyHeroRecord Halls for
their next upcoming CD "The Wicked Reincarnation" which contains 8 Tracks
like " Seed of the Doom", "Nothing than to Kill" or "Under the
Blackest Sky"
In early 2009 Marc ( ex-KADATH ) overtook the deep tunes. After some intense rehearsals SPAWN is prepared again to spread out the vicious intense death metal....

SPAWN split up with Dirk and decided to go on with one guitar.

2013 SPAWN will continue the way of destruction. The Band decided to take control over the whole recording process and established their own studio. 8 Titles are in progress at end 2013.


Line-up:

Marc - Bass
No. - Drums
Oliver - Guitars
Matt - Vocals
